data.name: Metin2 - Rising Hero Pack
data.detailed_description:
Metin2 – Rising Hero Pack


Enjoy power and glory with the Rising Hero Pack! With these epic items from the realm of the Dragon God, plus coupons for our shop currency, you can prove your mettle and dominate the battlefields of Metin2!

The Rising Hero Pack contains:

  • 2x DR Voucher (1000) – Vouchers worth 1000 Dragon Coins each (currency for the in-game item shop). Please note: The vouchers are not tradeable.
  • 10x Enchant Item – Swap your item’s bonuses for new ones
  • Unicorn (120 Days) – Legendary mount with +60 speed bonus
  • Leopard Cub (120 Days) – Cuddly companion provides you with +5% chance of critical hits and +10% defence bonus

Important:

  • The items will be bound to the account which you log into Metin2 with after purchase.
  • Visit the item shop in the game afterwards and open your item depot to deliver your items.
  • You may only purchase the Rising Hero Pack once per account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8 (Runs on Windows XP and up; no support offered.)
  • Processor: Pentium 3 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with more than 32 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support DirectX 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with more than 64 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support DirectX 9.0
